description: Calsos CSDJ (CSDJ-B 01.08.00 and earlier, CSDJ-H 01.08.00 and earlier, CSDJ-D 01.08.00 and earlier, and CSDJ-A 03.08.00 and earlier) allows remote attackers to bypass access restriction and to obtain unauthorized historical data without access privileges via unspecified vectors.

enisaIdProduct.product_version: CSDJ-B 01.08.00 and earlier, CSDJ-H 01.08.00 and earlier, CSDJ-D 01.08.00 and earlier, and CSDJ-A 03.08.00 and earlier
